name: Honkler
one_liner: A variation of Pepe the Frog dressed as a clown, used to comment on the perceived absurdity of the modern world ('Clown World').
meaning: The belief that the world has become so nonsensical that the only logical response is to laugh like a clown.
example_lines: Looking at the news and I'm putting on the wig, Honkler vibes
World's a circus, I'm just the frog with the nose
